creator: elephant@epf.pl
text:
I have added Recording Controller and HTTP Proxy Server to my WorkBench. On 
the "begining" Recording Controller records request good. If I run my own test 
and the test will finish (doesn't metter if it succesed or not) Recording 
Controller stops recording requests. Restarting HTTP Proxy Server doesn't 
help, the only way is restart JMeter.

Http Proxy recorder works fine if you put the Recording Controller under a
Thread Group in the test plan
